prompt: Generators of $U(2\nf)$. On the left we have explicit, properly normalised generators for $SU(4)$. To the right their general structure is given for arbitrary values of $\nf$. The matrices $H_{1,2}$ denote hermitian matrices. The matrix $S = S_R + i S_I$ denotes a complex, traceful, symmetric matrix. The matrix $A = A_R + i A_I$ denotes a complex, anti-symmetric matrix. All matrices are defined with respect to the Nambu-Gorkov basis \eqref{eq:dark_strong_quark_lagrangian_nambu_gorkov}.
